title: Looking for a font with K starting from the bottom like in pic
content:
Can you refer me to this font or something the similar K, that starts at the bottom?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317205059im_/http:/typophile.com/files/1424916616536_5340.jpg)

Thank you

Font: 

 http://fontpro.com/text-me-one-font-16485 

Solved By: 

 [DPape](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317205059/http:/typophile.com/user/3945 "View user profile.")
author: kreafindo

comments.content:
I think it's a Google font...  
Petretta, Julia/Text Me One  
 [http://fontpro.com/text-me-one-font-16485](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317205059/http:/fontpro.com/text-me-one-font-16485)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317205059im_/http:/typophile.com/files/kata1_3561.jpg)
Oh wow, even the exact font. Thank you DPape!!
But also, do you happen to have recommendations for other fonts with similar K?? Looking for options. Thanks.

Some names:  
weknow/thetrainingartist

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317205059im_/http:/typophile.com/files/kata2_6020.jpg)
  
Schumacher, Dieter/Nails 
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317205059im_/http:/typophile.com/files/kata3_3528.jpg)
  
Motzigemba, Stefan/lelim 800 
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317205059im_/http:/typophile.com/files/kata4_6312.jpg)
  
Gonz\_lez, Yun/Inspyratta 
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317205059im_/http:/typophile.com/files/kata5_5053.jpg)
  
/KarasHandwriting 
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317205059im_/http:/typophile.com/files/kaka6_6553.jpg)
  
Ngamrahong, Chantra/Modkanfire Light 
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317205059im_/http:/typophile.com/files/kata7_5554.jpg)
  
Blambot-Nate Piekos/Bottix 
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317205059im_/http:/typophile.com/files/kata8_6198.jpg)
Thanks, I can start from these and maybe look up some similar fonts. Thanks.
